title: Twisted Treeline Ranked 3v3
body: i was wandering why we have the 3v3 slot in our profiles and we cannot even play it? i really wanna play 3v3 ranked is this a bug or my client is bad? or maybe am i doing something wrong? please help {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
You can play Twisted Treeline during the evening on Thursdays and Fridays. There might be more but I can't remember the announcement from years ago.

There is no ranked play on Twisted Treeline; not even on the American servers, I believe. This is not a bug with your client.
